modmenu.descriptionTranslation.patpat: Simple Client and (Optional) Server side Fabric mod for patting any (living) mobs!
patpat.title: PatPat
patpat.modmenu.title: PatPat Client-Side Configuration Screen
patpat.modmenu.category.main.name: PatPat Client-Side Configuration Screen
patpat.modmenu.no_config_libraries_scree:
You need to install {0} or {1} to open PatPat Client Configuration Screen.

Â§7[Esc] to close
patpat.modmenu.group.main.name: Main
patpat.modmenu.option.enable_mod.name: Enable Mod
patpat.modmenu.option.enable_mod.descrip:
If enabled, you will see mob patting and other features;
if disabled, won't.
If enabled, additional info will be logged to console for debugging;
if disabled, won't.
patpat.modmenu.group.resource_packs.name: Resource Packs
patpat.modmenu.group.resource_packs.desc: Resource Pack settings of PatPat mod.
patpat.modmenu.option.skip_outdated_anim:
If enabled, resource packs animations with outdated config version will be skipped;
if disabled, won't.
patpat.modmenu.group.sound.name: Sound
patpat.modmenu.option.enable_sounds.name: Enable Sounds
patpat.modmenu.option.enable_sounds.desc:
If enabled, you will hear the patting sounds;
if disabled, won't.
patpat.modmenu.option.sounds_volume.name: Volume
patpat.modmenu.group.visual.name: Visual
patpat.modmenu.option.hiding_nickname_en:
If enabled, entity's nickname will disappear when you or someone pats it;
if disabled, won't.
patpat.modmenu.option.swing_hand_enabled:
If enabled, your hand in hud will moving;
if disabled, won't.
patpat.modmenu.option.lowering_animation:
If enabled, pat animation will lowering;
if disabled, won't.
patpat.modmenu.option.hand_offset_x.name: Hand Offset X
patpat.modmenu.option.hand_offset_x.desc: Transfer the hand along X axis relative to default pos.
patpat.modmenu.option.hand_offset_y.name: Hand Offset Y
patpat.modmenu.option.hand_offset_y.desc: Transfer the hand along Y axis relative to default pos.
patpat.modmenu.option.hand_offset_z.name: Hand Offset Z
patpat.modmenu.option.hand_offset_z.desc: Transfer the hand along Z axis relative to default pos.
patpat.modmenu.option.camera_shacking.de:
If enabled, your camera will shake when someone pat you;
if disabled, won't.
patpat.modmenu.option.pat_weight.name: Pat Weight
patpat.modmenu.option.pat_weight.descrip: The power of patting. The more, the stronger mob's squeeze effect will be.
patpat.modmenu.group.multiplayer.name: Multiplayer
patpat.modmenu.option.pat_me_enabled.des:
If enabled, other players will be able to pat you;
if disabled, won't be able.
patpat.modmenu.option.bypass_server_reso:
If enabled, server resource pack priority will bypassing;
if disabled, won't.
patpat.modmenu.group.proximity_packets.d:
Proximity packets are packets for exchanging small data between players close to each other.

PatPat Mod uses such packets in pat packets so that other players will see your pats, even without having a mod or plugin on the server.

Pure magic.
patpat.modmenu.option.proximity_packets_:
If enabled, other players will see pats from you (without mod or plugin on the server);
if disabled, they won't.
patpat.modmenu.option.max_packets_per_se:
Maximum number of proximity packets per second. This is to prevent the server from kicking you due to a large number of packets.
If you made 50 pats per second, with a limit of 10, you will see 50 pats per second, but other players will only see 10.

Use with caution at higher values!
patpat.command.error.time_not_time: {0} is not a valid time value (examples: 1sec, 5s, 5min)
patpat.command.error.only_one_player: This command can have only one player in argument
patpat.command.no_permission: You don't have permission to execute this command!

patpat.command.list.remove.already: Player {0} is already not on the list!

patpat.command.list.set.failed: {0} is not a valid list mode!
